::DarkMouse::

She saw a motion in the corner of her eye. She saw Akura scurring 
towards her.  She whipsered to Akura,"Go back to your cage and wait 
there." Of course the rat didn't listen to her.  It kept going and 
started to crawl up her leg.  She was not happy about this at all.  
Here she was, staring downt he barrel of a small cannon that Dracona 
was holding to her head, and her pet rat just had to have the 
inclination to go and crawl up her leg.  This was not good.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "ilovealllizards" <ilovealllizards@p...> 
wrote:
> *Twister kept looking at Dracona, waiting to see if she'd make a 
move or
> give in and have a talk. She stood there waiting*

> > ::DarkMouse::

> > She glanced over at Twister.  Even if Dracona killed her, the
> > autoguns and Twister wouldn't let her survive long enought to 
regret
> > her move.  She gave a wry smile.
> >
> > "Dracona, I give you this one chance, lower your gun. This will be
> > your last warning."
